title: Africa's Urban Housing Deficit
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Africa's Urban Housing Deficit.

hook.text: Africa needs 50 million new homes. By 2050, Lagos alone will have more people than most European countries.

buildup.text: Rapid urbanization is outpacing construction across the continent. Informal settlements are expanding fastest.

discovery.text: Mortgage penetration in Sub-Saharan Africa is under 3%. Most people build homes brick by brick over years.
